column4: My VNC server doesn't work unless there is a desktop running.  I was wondering if there is some way through terminal that I can launch the desktop
ssh in and sudo /etc/init.d/gdm start.. then vnc into it.
you might also be able to "startx" after ssh-ing in.
unplug one and see what it says.. plug the other in and see what it gets labeled as.. remember that it will probably change depeding on the usb port or after a boot.
